1989 was the year that saw them finally releasing Ã¢â‚¬Å“Horda GogaÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, first full-length album of the band. It contained 9 songs and was released under Ã¢â‚¬Å“Metal Master RecordsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. There are plans for a reunion, from Jaroslaw Gronowski, Adrian Frelich and Krystian Bytom (new drummer). They want to reissue all of the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s full-length albums and a new DVD from a festival in Jarocin. They also have plans on recording a brand new album. How? Will they do it on cassette?

In 2013, Marek Wojcieski, first singer for the band, passed away on September 8th, at the age of 46.Much to young ...but Im still wondering what is cassette?
